member.name: P:nanoFramework.UI.GraphicDrivers.St7789.Width
member.summary: Default weight. Use to overrride the one you'll pass in the screen and add it to the driver.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.UI.GraphicDrivers.St7789.Height
member.summary: Default height. Use to overrride the one you'll pass in the screen and add it to the driver.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.UI.GraphicDrivers.St7789.GraphicDriver
member.summary: Gets the graphic driver for the ST7735 display.
